skillTree.localised_description: The charm hung around Beasts Wizard's neck is said to ward away arrows and fell sorcery.

Wizards of Ghur can call upon the attributes of various spirits of the wild and are able to summon the strength of the bear, the swiftness of the hare, the eyesight of an eagle, and the heightened senses of smell and hearing of the wolf.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: "Drop these seeds into your garden and your harvest shall be bountiful indeed! But pick not the eye-laden stalk, not even once!"
Into the boughs and under the snow, where the witches dance and the new spring grows.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can pass through trees.

skillTree.localised_description: Orsini has fully devoted himself to studying the ancient scrolls of Kadon that were uncovered from the Red Vault beneath Verdenza, convinced that his techniques are far more effectual for binding creatures than the Teclisian method.
Bound by a Binding Scroll of Kadon, Silak One-Eye will emerge from the watery depths to drown those who would threaten his master.

effects.description: Enables bound spell "Silak's Tidecall" when fighting at sea

target_if: Not on or below a platform

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting at sea
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Orsini has served Verdenza well for many years, but his decisive victories in the War of Beasts and at the Battle of the Howling Abyss have cemented him as a Tilean hero of legend.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations : +10 with the Southern Realms (Except Estalians)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: The Council of Tears employs Republican Guards of Verdenza as its main fighting force, supported by mercenaries such as Tobaran crossbowmen and Sartosan privateers. But they do not scorn the use of darker forces should the need arise... or should the price be lower.

effects.description:
Weapon Damage: +7% for all Spear & Halberd units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon Damage: +15% for all Spear & Halberd units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Ever since the Battle of the Howling Abyss, Orsini has kept a company of mercenary Ogres to ensure his safety should his beasts fail.

effects.description:
Melee attack and Melee defence: +6 for All Ogre Kingdoms units (including mercenaries)
	(all units in army)
Number of uses +1 for "Scrolls of Binding"

skillTree.localised_description: He was an adept in the use of the Brown Wind,[1b] although he confessed his own skills were only of middling rank compared to that of the true masters.

ui_effects.localised_text: Can cause damage to friendly combatants
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: This book, authored by Orsini Sardus himself, deals with a veritable carnival of monsters, both arcane and bloodthirsty, all of which sow terror across the world.

effects.description:
Enables attribute "Glorious Charge" for all monsters & beasts
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities
Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon was a master of forms, able to shift his shape to that of any monster. One day he found he could not change back.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summoned unit has greatly increased melee attack and melee defence

skillTree.localised_description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon the Shackler was said to be one of the most powerful wizards in Human history, and the father of what was once known by ancient wizards as the Arcana of Kadon, a body of magical lore that allowed Human wizards to achieve feats that they are no longer capable of at present. Kadon also created the famed scrolls of binding. These scrolls had been largely expended by the time of the War of Beasts, particularly by the wizards of the Tilean city-state of Vedenza, including Orsini Sardus and the Arabyan Court Alchemist Tazadis.
Orsini utters a primal yell, instilling in his allies the wrath of the god of wild places himself.

effects.description: Enables ability "Taal's Fury" during Forest battles

skillTree.localised_description: Wizards of Ghur embrace the savagery of the Brown Winds, allowing them to control and communicate with wild beasts.
Through foreboding forests, deep dungeons and desolate deserts, Orsini has spent a considerable time travelling the world to master his unique arcane art.
Preceded by his reputation, Orsini is welcome throughout the Southern Realms and lands beyond.

effects.description: Immune to diplomatic penalties from trespassing

skillTree.localised_description: The longtime spy of the Council of Tears, Orsini has become exceptionally talented at stealth and subterfuge for a man who surrounds himself with slavering monsters.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 15

skillTree.localised_description: Orsinis silver tongue and exquisite cunning always find the best deal for himself and his benefactors.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Having spent time with the Assassins Guild in Luccini and even survived a duel with the notorious Black Crowe, Orsini has great experience in dealing death.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 8% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Orsini Sardus serves as the envoy of the rulers of Verdenza, the Council of Tears. He oversees all manner of dealings for the Council, routinely extracting very agreeable arrangements from partners of the humble City-State.
A Galleon of Tilean design, the Pride of Zorra is Orsinis private vessel, capable of raining down barrages of cannon fire from miles away.
Orsini has had several close calls, yet somehow, he always manages to evade the cold grasp of Morr and live to fight another day.

effects.description: Replenishes 25% campaign movement range after enemy retreats from battle

skillTree.localised_description: Orsini is a Beastbinder, not a Beastcapturer, which is why he employs an experienced group of Beast-Hunters to aid him in wrangling tougher creatures.

effects.description:
Exotic Animals resource production: 10 cages
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: The reason as to why Kadon was so successful at binding monsters where other, more talented, mages have failed is simple: rather than suppressing a creatures primal instincts, Kadon embraced them. A primitive mind might work wonders where the careful reasoning of a more sophisticated one would surely fail. That is the uncomfortable truth behind his schools of binding.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: A bag full of scrolls containing bound monsters ranging from vile Brood Horrors to raging Stonehorns.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 10% chance of success

Army Ability "Scrolls of Binding" when fighting against some races
	(own army)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

items.colour_text: These records detail the Fall of Tor Karyndis, better known in Estalia as the Shattered Tower. Orsini bought this priceless artefact from a simple merchant who had recovered it after the sack of Kuliis, not fully understanding what he had come to possess. Deciphering this ancient Elven tome reveals a wealth of lost Asur knowledge and buried history.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Skaven
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
	(all units in army)

target_if: Not on or below a platform

items.colour_text: A satchel kitted with a host of different potions and elixirs, which belonged to the Court Alchemist of Verdenza, Tazadis of Araby, who fought bravely during the War of Beasts but was felled by a Skaven assassin.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

items.colour_text: Orsini is a Beastbinder, not a Beastcapturer, which is why he employs an experienced group of Beast-Hunters to aid him in wrangling tougher creatures.

effects.description:
Exotic Animals resource production: 10 cages
	(local region)

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs units with 25 or more entities

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An expert in the ancient art of the Arcana of Kadon, Orsini Sardus is a force to be reckoned with. He unleashes his menagerie of bound monsters to defend his home, the City-State of Verdenza.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
